mapper.select: select t.position_code,t.position_name,t.from_type from ( select hp.position_code, hp.position_name,'0' as from_type from hx_position hp union select distinct(ep.positioncode) as position_code, ep.positionname as position_name,'1' as from_type from emp_empposition ep ) t

SELECT t.* FROM (select hup.position_id,hup.user_login_name, hup.from_type from hx_user_position hup union select emp.position_id,emp.user_login_name,emp.from_type from hx_emp_unload emp) up left join ( select hp.position_code, hp.position_name, '0' as from_type from hx_position hp union select distinct(ep.positioncode) as position_code, ep.positionname as position_name,'1' as from_type from emp_empposition ep ) t on up.position_id = t.position_code where up.user_login_name = #{userLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and up.from_type = #{fromType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from hx_user_position where 1=1 and position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
